bodyProps.title: About
bodyProps.children:
Founded in 2016, we are a collective of hackers who host a weeklyhack-a-thon on Sundays. We band together to explore our ideas and hackthem into existence. We are developers, artists, students, and friends.Hacker Sunday is supposed to be a sustainable hack-a-thon experience,unlike your typical 24hr hack-a-thon.

There's no specific topic except you can't hack on 'work' projects.Hacker Sunday is a place where you can explore freely with the supportof your peers. We want to set aside Sundays for you to try things outand genuinely do cool shit. Not do more work for your corporateoverlords.

linkProps.linkTitle: Become A Hacker And Join Us
linkProps.subtitle: Join our Discord Server and add the Hacker Sunday Role
